# ===== C# / ASP.NET Core / Visual Studio =====

# Build folders
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio cache / temp
.vs/
.vscode/
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Publish outputs
/publish/
/dist/

# Secrets and credentials
secrets.json
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json

# Node.js (if you use npm or yarn)
node_modules/

# Python virtual environment (optional)
.venv/

# Firestore credentials (JSON key)
*.json

# Git itself
.gitignore
